alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Real (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 10:23PM CDT until April 20 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN EDWARDS AND NORTHWESTERN REAL COUNTIES... At 1022 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Rocksprings, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Devil`s Sinkhole State Natural Area. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
